name: Front Panel Designer Project
summary: Learn about .FPD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When a Front Panel Designer design is complete, you can give the design to Front Panel Express, who manufacturers and ships the resulting product back to you.

description: An FPD file is a CAD project file created by Front Panel Designer, a program used for designing physical panels for speakers, radios, and other equipment. It contains the measurements and specifications of the design and includes the materials, color, and finish.
